channel.title: Client error. 317
channel.description:
I downloaded a clean 317 client becuase I wanted to make a custom client. I log in, then it says loading please wait then it just stays like that. On the server cmd, it says that I connected and loading has finished but on the client cmd it comes up with this error [code] Exception in thread "Thread-4" java.lang.ArithmeticException: / by zero at client.GOP(client.java:9442) at client.method126(client.java:9589) at client.method112(client.java:8841) at client.method146(client.java:12052) at client.method102(client.java:7756) at client.method9(client.java:8641) at Applet_Sub1.run(Applet_Sub1.java:129) at client.run(client.java:4433) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) [/code] I had a look at the methods but since I'm new to clients I don't understand it that much. =P
Any help will be appreciated. :)

item.title: Client error. 317
item.dc:creator: @Nom_Nom Nom Nom
item.description:
@Nom_Nom wrote:

[quote=“puffypain, post:2, topic:337789”]It means there is an error in the java code in the following places stated there.
With an advanced compiler, it should say the errors in advance.
When fixed, im sure your client will run properly[/quote]

Really? I never knew it meant there was an error. Coincidence that I put it comes up with an error in the title and my post. :eek:

Read full topic

item.title: Client error. 317
item.dc:creator: @puffypain puffypain
item.description:
@puffypain wrote:

It means there is an error in the java code in the following places stated there.
With an advanced compiler, it should say the errors in advance.
When fixed, im sure your client will run properly

Read full topic

item.title: Client error. 317
item.dc:creator: @Nom_Nom Nom Nom
item.description:
@Nom_Nom wrote:

I downloaded a clean 317 client becuase I wanted to make a custom client. I log in, then it says loading please wait then it just stays like that. On the server cmd, it says that I connected and loading has finished but on the client cmd it comes up with this error

Exception in thread "Thread-4" java.lang.ArithmeticException: / by zero
        at client.GOP(client.java:9442)
        at client.method126(client.java:9589)
        at client.method112(client.java:8841)
        at client.method146(client.java:12052)
        at client.method102(client.java:7756)
        at client.method9(client.java:8641)
        at Applet_Sub1.run(Applet_Sub1.java:129)
        at client.run(client.java:4433)
        at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)

I had a look at the methods but since I’m new to clients I don’t understand it that much. =P

Any help will be appreciated.

Read full topic
